lines.text:
[after being out on the windows with Michael]
Baboon scared?
Yes, Baboon scared. Baboon not know he could *be* so scared. Baboon's pants a little damp.

[yelling at the airport]
Oh, God! I'm dead! I've lost my house! Where will my children live?
[Richard, Michael and Mimi exit Jovanovic's office]
Richard, are you out of your mind? Now we're laundering money for the Russian mafia?
Yes, we are, and we'll iron it for them too.
What kind of dumb name is Mimi Siku?
Don't be rude. He probably thinks Andrew is a dumb name.
So do I.
I think Mimi Siku is a nice name.
You would.
Do you mean to tell me that you are walking around New York City with A MILLION DOLLARS IN A SUITCASE?
[Michael and Richard are aguing about being a parent, while Richard tries to get Karen out of her room]
Oh, what? Are you suddenly Dr Spock here? You've been a father for three days. And you're giving me lessons? Well, that's good.
You sound like an idiot.
I'm a parent! Therefore, I'm an idiot! I have spent every day for the last 12 years worrying about my kids. About their safety, about their happiness, about their crooked teeth.
His name's Mimi-Siku. Roughly translated, it means "cat piss".
He *chose* the name "cat piss"?
He was six years old at the time! It's a territorial thing.

[showing Mimi how to use the toilet]
Before you pee, you lift the seat; after you pee, you put the seat back down. Females in tribe start war over this. Many deaths.
I should probably take some pictures of Mimi.
I can never have enough pictures of my kids. I have like, four hundred albums. I never look at them, but they exist... it's good, you know?
I want to see Statue of Liberty, I go!

[picking a finger to cut off of Richard Kempster]
Eeny... Meeny...
[arrives at middle finger]
Meiny - no, need that one for traffic... mo.
You make a fool of Jovanovic.
No.
In front of my comrades and my community. You waste my time, you try to cheat me!
[Jovanovic takes out a knife]
Now, you must pay! Sit still, coward! Now, I teach you never,
[grabs Richard's right arm]
NEVER to make fool of Jovanovic again!
[after Michael and Mimi depart from a taxi cab]
We're meeting this guy at a fish stall?
No, no. He is ABOVE a fish stall.
Much better!

[Initiates Karen into his tribe]
Choose a name.
Choose for me.

[thinks for a moment]
Ukume.
What?
U-Ku-May.
What does it mean?
It means, "sound of rain on river water."
"Ukume." It's pretty.
[kisses him]
I'll get some matches and we'll smoke her out.
That's it, Andrew, bite him! Use those crooked teeth!
In Lipo Lipo, we eat with hands.
In New York, New York, we eat with forks.

[after Mimi-Siku suggests they eat Coco the cat]
Cat's job feed people.
No, not here. Here, cat's job is to sleep, lick crotch.

[seeing Karen for the first time]
Angel on table...
Mr. Cromwell? The young man you're with is, ah, urinating on the exit doors...

[offered bat bladder in Lipo Lipo]
Bat bladder? Holy kaopectate; I don't think so.

[pointing to toucan in flight]
A hoko!
Hoko Ono.
I have many enemies, but none like that spider.
Come out, honey, or Andrew is going to smoke you out.
Cool!

[whispering]
I was kidding!
[sees Lipo Lipo for the first time]
Oh my God. She left me for Gilligan's Island.
What do you call this place again? The Surface of the Sun!

[throws piraña]
Cut. Infection. DEAD!

[to his Mom, who's eating Mimi's homemade fish]
Mom, Tarzan is eating Daddy's fish.
Daddy's fish?
